data.lyric:
[ti:half of my hometown(feat. Kenny Chesney)]
[ar:Kelsea Ballerini/Kenny Chesney]
[al:kelsea]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]half of my hometown(feat. Kenny Chesney) - Kelsea Ballerini (凯尔西·巴莱里尼)/Kenny Chesney (肯尼·切斯尼)
[00:13.27]Kelsea Ballerini：
[00:14.18]Half of my high school got too drunk
[00:17.64]Half of my high school fell in love with the girl next door
[00:24.19]In their daddy's Ford
[00:27.89]And half of my main street's mini skirts
[00:31.57]Half of my main street's dressed for church
[00:34.66]It could use some rain and a fresh coat of paint
[00:40.56]Kelsea Ballerini/Kenny Chesney：
[00:40.73]Half of my hometown's still hangin' around
[00:44.10]Still talkin' about that one touchdown
[00:47.81]They're still wearin' red and black
[00:51.34]"Go Bobcats" while the other half
[00:54.66]Of my hometown they all got out
[00:58.35]Some went north some went south
[01:02.08]They're still lookin' for a feelin' half of us ain't found
[01:08.37]So stay or leave part of me will always be
[01:15.03]Half of my hometown
[01:23.87]Half of our prom queens cut their hair
[01:27.20]Half of them think that it ain't fair
[01:30.45]The quarterback moved away and never came back
[01:37.68]Half of my family is happy I left
[01:40.96]The other half worries I'll just forget
[01:44.53]Where I came from
[01:46.86]Same place where they came from
[01:50.20]Half of my hometown's still hangin' around
[01:53.83]Still talkin' about that one touchdown
[01:57.48]They're still wearin' red and black
[02:00.79]"Go Bobcats" while the other half
[02:04.22]Of my hometown they all got out
[02:07.90]Some went north some went south
[02:11.73]They're still lookin' for a feelin' half of us ain't found
[02:18.05]So stay or leave part of me will always be
[02:24.63]Half of my hometown
[02:29.51]Mm half of my hometown
[02:35.07]Oh
[02:40.33]Back roads raised us
[02:43.66]Highways they take us
[02:47.03]Memories make us wanna go back
[02:52.93]To our hometown settle down
[02:56.77]Talk about that one touchdown
[03:00.34]Raise some kids in red and black
[03:03.56]"Go Bobcats" while the other half
[03:06.74]Of our hometown was in the crowd
[03:10.31]They knew the words they sang them loud
[03:14.60]And all I wanna do is make them proud
[03:20.86]'Cause half of me will always be Knoxville Tennessee
[03:29.82]My hometown
[03:32.86]Oh
[03:36.61]My hometown
[03:38.44]My hometown
data.trans:
[ti:half of my hometown(feat. Kenny Chesney)]
[ar:Kelsea Ballerini/Kenny Chesney]
[al:kelsea]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:13.27]//
[00:14.18]我的高中生涯有一半都在醉酒中度过
[00:17.64]我的高中生涯有一半都在爱慕着隔壁的女孩
[00:24.19]那些坐在爸爸的福特轿车里的女孩
[00:27.89]我参加的竞选活动里 有一半都是穿的短裙
[00:31.57]还有一半是为了教堂而打扮
[00:34.66]一件漆皮大衣混合着雨水
[00:40.56]//
[00:40.73]我的家乡有一半还是老样子
[00:44.10]人们还在谈论着那次激动人心的得分
[00:47.81]他们还是穿着红黑相间的队服
[00:51.34]大声呼喊着 加油啊山猫队 
[00:54.66]然而与此同时 另一半人早已背井离乡
[00:58.35]有人去了北边 有人去了南边
[01:02.08]他们追寻着更高的境界 而我们这些人却从未想过
[01:08.37]所以啊 不管是离开还是留下 我的一部分就是
[01:15.03]我故乡的一部分
[01:23.87]当初的舞会皇后们有一半都剪去了长发
[01:27.20]有一半的人都觉得这不公平
[01:30.45]曾经的四分卫搬走了 再也没回来
[01:37.68]在我离开后 我家里有一半的人都很高兴
[01:40.96]而另一半人则担心我会遗忘
[01:44.53]我的故乡
[01:46.86]也就是他们的故乡
[01:50.20]我的家乡有一半还是老样子
[01:53.83]人们还在谈论着那次激动人心的得分
[01:57.48]他们还是穿着红黑相间的队服
[02:00.79]大声呼喊着 加油啊山猫队
[02:04.22]然而与此同时 另一半人早已背井离乡
[02:07.90]有人去了北边 有人去了南边
[02:11.73]他们追寻着更高的境界 而我们这些人却从未想过
[02:18.05]所以啊 不管是离开还是留下 我的一部分就是
[02:24.63]我故乡的一部分
[02:29.51]我故乡的一部分
[02:35.07]//
[02:40.33]这些乡间小道养育了我们
[02:43.66]高速公路承载了我们
[02:47.03]种种回忆让我想重返故乡
[02:52.93]回到我们的故乡安居乐业
[02:56.77]和人们谈论着那次激动人心的得分
[03:00.34]带着我们的孩子 穿着红黑相间的队服
[03:03.56]大声呼喊着 加油啊山猫队
[03:06.74]然而与此同时另一半人在人群中
[03:10.31]大声歌唱着熟悉的民谣
[03:14.60]我唯一的梦想 就是让他们为我感到骄傲
[03:20.86]因为我的另一半永远属于田纳西诺诚
[03:29.82]我的故乡
[03:32.86]//
[03:36.61]我的故乡
[03:38.44]我的故乡
